Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Leviathan Drive, walking between the Ruins and an old forest.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Ruins is along Avatar Boulevard, which is the next north-south street to the west. On the east side of the road you can see a very old and undisturbed forest. There has been some mention of druids by members of the clergy.
